title: Can't find account transfer service under Account
body:
I transferred my NA account to EUW but I want to transfer back to NA, however, I couldn't find any transfer service under Account page. There only have Summoner Name Change service.
BTW, my account name is boreasee.
Thank you.

replies.body:
Its currently offline atm due to the season ending next week and the database wants to keep everywhere where they are until the season rewards are released.

Expect the transfers to be open at the end of the month. 

You can read more about it here: https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown
Account Transfers are currently closed in anticipation of the end of season. They should be opened back up on Nov 20!
